thread.section_title: The Leon Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value, good location - highly recommended
thread.title_full: Great value, good location - highly recommended - Review of The Leon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: b3nzow
title: Great value, good location - highly recommended
text:
The good
- Rooms are big, modern and very clean. They are the same as seen in pictures
- Rooms were very quiet. Didnt hear any noise from other rooms or outside (we stayed in room 203)
- Bathroom is big. Shower had good water pressure.
- Bed was comfortable
- Good location with 2 subway stations within 5-10 mins walk. Close to walk to Brooklyn bridge, downtown and lower east side
- Lots of good restaurants close by in China town
- Staff were great! Very helpful and cheery
- Cold / hot water is provided in basement which was good
The bad
- nothing. Highly recommended and I would definitely stay here again
Room Tip: Stayed on second floor (room 203) which was a corner room and it was very quiet See more room tips
